channel.title: Pid file /run/tor/tor.pid/ doesn't exist an one other error
channel.description:
I'm using CLI version of Whonix (XFCE will freeze my computer :D)
I'm trying to create hidden service with a tutorial from youtube.
I can't connect to tor. When I run **sudo service tor status** it says **active (exited)** I have also tried **sudo service tor@default restart** but nothing happens. Then I have to restart my VM.
When I was following the tutorial I ran command **sudo cat /var/lib/tor/hidden_service/hostname** to check my onion address. It says that **file doesn't exist**
How I can fix these errors?

item.title: Pid file /run/tor/tor.pid/ doesn't exist an one other error
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Pid file /run/tor/tor.pid/ doesn't exist is probably the root issue to concentrate on.

hmbrgr666:

When I was following the tutorial I ran command sudo cat /var/lib/tor/hidden_service/hostname to check my onion address. It says that file doesn’t exist

This part of the issue must be ignored until the root issue is fixed.
(Once the next issue is fixed, this issue is probably also fixed.)

hmbrgr666:

I run sudo service tor status

–>
tor@default

Also…

  • Configuration Check
  • Log Analysis

Also useful, learn how to setup a Tor onion service outside of Whonix. As if you did not now Whonix existed. And then setup a Tor onion service there. As per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

Read full topic
item.source: Pid file /run/tor/tor.pid/ doesn't exist an one other error
